name: OxygenConcentratorTherapyDevice
title: Oxygen Concentrator Therapy Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Portable and stationary oxygen concentrator therapy devices for use in the home.),(Data Element Scope: Portable and stationary oxygen concentrator therapy devices accepted by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid as valid for home use.),(Inclusion Criteria: Portable and stationary oxygen concentrator therapy devices for use in the home.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

contains.display: Oxygen concentrator, single delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate
Oxygen concentrator, dual delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate, each
